Facilitando o Aprendizado do Português p: Facilitating Portuguese Learning for Haitians in Brazil
Eu sou Mikenson Thomas, haitiano, gradua: I am Mikenson Thomas, a Haitian graduating in Computer Science at IFC Brasil. This site is my Thesis Project (TCC) with the goal of facilitating Portuguese language learning for Haitian immigrants in Brazil. Through this site, you will have access to some well-organized YouTube videos to improve your Portuguese skills.
Plataforma de língua portuguesa para est: Plataforma de língua portuguesa para estrangeiros haitianos.
